report: Ultrasound examination of the neck and thyroid gland reveals diffuse enlargement and heterogeneous echotexture, consistent with thyroiditis. Multiple nodules are noted in both lobes, with the largest nodule measuring 2.4 cm in the right lobe, graded as BTA U2. No abnormal lymph nodes are identified. The findings are suggestive of chronic thyroiditis with multinodular goitre. Further evaluation with thyroid function tests and clinical correlation is recommended
label: thy normal-thy
